DOC.brief_summary: Study to characterize the steady-state pharmacokinetics of codeine and its metabolites morphine, morphine-3-glucuronide (M3G), and morphine-6-glucuronide (M6G) after oral administration of Roxane Laboratories' codeine sulfate tablets administered at a dose of 15 mg Q4H x 5 days.
DOC.brief_title: Steady State Study of Codeine Sulfate
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to codeine sulfate or any comparable or similar product.
